TopicTitle: The Neverending Story About The Previous Avatar

Articles.Content:
This Thread is similar to the other neverending story thread, but this thread, the parts of the story you add, has to be related to the previous user's avatar or user banner in some way.
Since im the first in this thread, i dont really have anyone lol, so the first person to reply adds to the story that relates to my avatar or user cover banner thing lol.
Ima start

Jeb is in space...

flying a large vessel with the intent to deliver many delicious snacks to a nearby orbital outpost. While Jeb pilots the ship Bill eagerly awaits the arrival of Snack Ship One.

 

053201272021

Edited January 27, 2021 by AlamoVampire
But then Calvin travels through time and space, and delivers snacks through the wall of the ship somehow. Bill exclaims
nothing could get through whatever this thing is!

What thing, what do you see Bill?

I dunno, it green... very green and coming right for us.
A kerbal standing in the planet observed as all these events unfolded and was hungry too, he wanted snacks.
Unfortunately all of the snacks had already been eaten by a weird-looking cat.
While they are in a starship that is bellyflopping at
what appears to be somewhere near the KSC
and throwing SLS at random things
While a small child watches on in ecstasy
While eating soup
and flying a poorly built plane (get rekt)
but that didn't stop the small eyeglasses wearing child,
who then proceeds to launch a gargantuan
squared kite with wings.
which them proceeds to anonymously
fly over booster bay
while looking at the sun and gets blinded somehow and then
suddenly see the green below the blue
And realizes that his save has corrupted by his default mods so then he goes into the save file and
finds Jeb floating in space with
a weird kerbal playing with toy rockets. Jeb explodes...
And a kerbal screams at that.
Some random cat thing shows up and
